sqlMap.select:
select count(*) from ( select TT.* from (select T.AUDIT_NO, '2' AS AUDIT_STATUS, T.CONTRACT_NO, T.CONTRACTSNM, T.REPORT_NO, T.PROJECT_MANAGER, T.PROJECT_NAME, T.PROJECT_TYPE, T.PROJECT_STATUS, T.AGENT_NO, T.AGENT_CO_NAME, T.AGENT_CO_MANAGER, T.AGENT_CO_MANAGER_TEL, T.AGENT_CO_STAFF, T.AGENT_CO_STAFF_TEL, T.AGENT_CO_POST_ADDRESS, T.AGENT_CO_MAIL, T.PROF_NO, T.PROF_CO_NAME, T.PROF_CO_MANAGER, T.PROF_CO_MANAGER_TEL, T.PROF_CO_STAFF, T.PROF_CO_STAFF_TEL, T.PROF_CO_POST_ADDRESS, T.PROF_CO_MAIL, T.CONTRACT_CO_NO, T.CONTRACT_CO_NAME, T.CONTRACT_CO_MANAGER, T.CONTRACT_CO_MANAGER_TEL, T.CONTRACT_CO_STAFF, T.CONTRACT_CO_STAFF_TEL, T.CONTRACT_CO_POST_ADDRESS, T.CONTRACT_CO_MAIL, T.DOC_REC_DATE, T.PROGRESS_STATUS, T.PRE_SET, T.PRE_PRICE, T.SUPPORT_DOC_DATE, T.DRAFT_DATE, T.APPROVAL_SND_DATE, T.APPROVAL_RCV_DATE, T.DELI_NO, T.REPORT_RAISE_DATE, T.REPORT_SEAL_DATE, T.REPORT_ARR_TYPE, T.REPORT_ARR_DATE, T.REG_DATE, T.AGENT_INFO, T.CONTRACT_CO_ID, T.CONTRACT_CO_INFO, T.VERIFY_PER_AMOUNT, T.VERIFY_AMOUNT, T.VERIFY_INCREASE, T.VERIFY_DECREASE, T.VERIFY_DIFF, T.VERIFY_DIFF_RATE, T.CNT_PRICE, T.PROJ_PRICE, T.LIMIT_PRICE, T.CNTRCT_PRICE, T.PLAN_DOC_RCV_DATE, T.PLAN_DOC_RPT_DATE, T.PLAN_DOC_SND_DATE, T.PLAN_DOC_ARR_DATE, T.BID_DOC_RCV_DATE, T.BID_DOC_RPT_DATE, T.BID_DOC_SND_DATE, T.BID_DOC_ARR_DATE, T.SIGN_DOC_RCV_DATE, T.SIGN_DOC_RPT_DATE, T.SIGN_DOC_SND_DATE, T.SIGN_DOC_ARR_DATE, T.SET_DOC_RCV_DATE, T.SET_DOC_RPT_DATE, T.SET_DOC_SND_DATE, T.SET_DOC_ARR_DATE, T.PROGRESS_STATUS_MEMO, T.A_AMOUNT, T.A_STATUS, T.B_TYPE, T.B_AMOUNT, T.A_INVOICE_DELI_DATE, T.A_INVOICE_DATE, T.A_INVOICE_NO, T.A_SET_DATE, T.B_INVOICE_DELI_DATE, T.B_INVOICE_DATE, T.B_INVOICE_NO, T.B_SET_DATE, T.RESERVE1, T.RESERVE2, T.RESERVE3, T.RESERVE4, T.RESERVE5, T.RESERVE6, T.RESERVE7, T.RESERVE8, T.RESERVE9, T.RESERVE10, T.LATEST_FLG, T.DELETE_FLG, T.UPDATE_USER, T.INSERT_DATE, T.UPDATE_DATE from audit T where 1 = 1 and T.DELETE_FLG = '1'
T.AUDIT_NO >= #AUDIT_NO_LOW#
T.AUDIT_NO <= #AUDIT_NO_HIGH#
T.PROJECT_STATUS = #PROJECT_STATUS#
SUBSTRING_INDEX(T.REPORT_NO,'-',1) like '%$REPORT_NO_COMP$%' ESCAPE '/'
SUBSTRING_INDEX(T.REPORT_NO,'-',-1) >= #REPORT_NO_LOW#
SUBSTRING_INDEX(T.REPORT_NO,'-',-1) <= #REPORT_NO_HIGH#
T.PROJECT_MANAGER like '%$PROJECT_MANAGER$%' ESCAPE '/'
T.AGENT_NO = #AGENT_NO#
T.AGENT_CO_NAME like '%$AGENT_CO_NAME$%' ESCAPE '/'
T.CONTRACT_CO_NAME like '%$CONTRACT_CO_NAME$%' ESCAPE '/'
T.PROJECT_NAME like '%$PROJECT_NAME$%' ESCAPE '/'
T.RESERVE1 = #RESERVE1#
) TT where 1 = 1 AND (TT.B_SET_DATE IS NULL OR TT.B_SET_DATE > NOW()) UNION select TT.* from (select T.AUDIT_NO, '3' AS AUDIT_STATUS, T.CONTRACT_NO, T.CONTRACTSNM, T.REPORT_NO, T.PROJECT_MANAGER, T.PROJECT_NAME, T.PROJECT_TYPE, T.PROJECT_STATUS, T.AGENT_NO, T.AGENT_CO_NAME, T.AGENT_CO_MANAGER, T.AGENT_CO_MANAGER_TEL, T.AGENT_CO_STAFF, T.AGENT_CO_STAFF_TEL, T.AGENT_CO_POST_ADDRESS, T.AGENT_CO_MAIL, T.PROF_NO, T.PROF_CO_NAME, T.PROF_CO_MANAGER, T.PROF_CO_MANAGER_TEL, T.PROF_CO_STAFF, T.PROF_CO_STAFF_TEL, T.PROF_CO_POST_ADDRESS, T.PROF_CO_MAIL, T.CONTRACT_CO_NO, T.CONTRACT_CO_NAME, T.CONTRACT_CO_MANAGER, T.CONTRACT_CO_MANAGER_TEL, T.CONTRACT_CO_STAFF, T.CONTRACT_CO_STAFF_TEL, T.CONTRACT_CO_POST_ADDRESS, T.CONTRACT_CO_MAIL, T.DOC_REC_DATE, T.PROGRESS_STATUS, T.PRE_SET, T.PRE_PRICE, T.SUPPORT_DOC_DATE, T.DRAFT_DATE, T.APPROVAL_SND_DATE, T.APPROVAL_RCV_DATE, T.DELI_NO, T.REPORT_RAISE_DATE, T.REPORT_SEAL_DATE, T.REPORT_ARR_TYPE, T.REPORT_ARR_DATE, T.REG_DATE, T.AGENT_INFO, T.CONTRACT_CO_ID, T.CONTRACT_CO_INFO, T.VERIFY_PER_AMOUNT, T.VERIFY_AMOUNT, T.VERIFY_INCREASE, T.VERIFY_DECREASE, T.VERIFY_DIFF, T.VERIFY_DIFF_RATE, T.CNT_PRICE, T.PROJ_PRICE, T.LIMIT_PRICE, T.CNTRCT_PRICE, T.PLAN_DOC_RCV_DATE, T.PLAN_DOC_RPT_DATE, T.PLAN_DOC_SND_DATE, T.PLAN_DOC_ARR_DATE, T.BID_DOC_RCV_DATE, T.BID_DOC_RPT_DATE, T.BID_DOC_SND_DATE, T.BID_DOC_ARR_DATE, T.SIGN_DOC_RCV_DATE, T.SIGN_DOC_RPT_DATE, T.SIGN_DOC_SND_DATE, T.SIGN_DOC_ARR_DATE, T.SET_DOC_RCV_DATE, T.SET_DOC_RPT_DATE, T.SET_DOC_SND_DATE, T.SET_DOC_ARR_DATE, T.PROGRESS_STATUS_MEMO, T.A_AMOUNT, T.A_STATUS, T.B_TYPE, T.B_AMOUNT, T.A_INVOICE_DELI_DATE, T.A_INVOICE_DATE, T.A_INVOICE_NO, T.A_SET_DATE, T.B_INVOICE_DELI_DATE, T.B_INVOICE_DATE, T.B_INVOICE_NO, T.B_SET_DATE, T.RESERVE1, T.RESERVE2, T.RESERVE3, T.RESERVE4, T.RESERVE5, T.RESERVE6, T.RESERVE7, T.RESERVE8, T.RESERVE9, T.RESERVE10, T.LATEST_FLG, T.DELETE_FLG, T.UPDATE_USER, T.INSERT_DATE, T.UPDATE_DATE from audit T where 1 = 1 and T.DELETE_FLG = '1'
T.AUDIT_NO >= #AUDIT_NO_LOW#
T.AUDIT_NO <= #AUDIT_NO_HIGH#
T.PROJECT_STATUS = #PROJECT_STATUS#
SUBSTRING_INDEX(T.REPORT_NO,'-',1) like '%$REPORT_NO_COMP$%' ESCAPE '/'
SUBSTRING_INDEX(T.REPORT_NO,'-',-1) >= #REPORT_NO_LOW#
SUBSTRING_INDEX(T.REPORT_NO,'-',-1) <= #REPORT_NO_HIGH#
T.PROJECT_MANAGER like '%$PROJECT_MANAGER$%' ESCAPE '/'
T.AGENT_NO = #AGENT_NO#
T.AGENT_CO_NAME like '%$AGENT_CO_NAME$%' ESCAPE '/'
T.CONTRACT_CO_NAME like '%$CONTRACT_CO_NAME$%' ESCAPE '/'
T.PROJECT_NAME like '%$PROJECT_NAME$%' ESCAPE '/'
T.RESERVE1 = #RESERVE1#
) TT where 1 = 1 AND TT.B_SET_DATE IS NOT NULL AND TT.B_SET_DATE <= NOW() ) B where 1 = 1
B.AUDIT_STATUS in ($AUDIT_STATUS$)

select B.* from ( select TT.* from (select T.AUDIT_NO, '2' AS AUDIT_STATUS, T.CONTRACT_NO, T.CONTRACTSNM, T.REPORT_NO, T.PROJECT_MANAGER, T.PROJECT_NAME, T.PROJECT_TYPE, T.PROJECT_STATUS, T.AGENT_NO, T.AGENT_CO_NAME, T.AGENT_CO_MANAGER, T.AGENT_CO_MANAGER_TEL, T.AGENT_CO_STAFF, T.AGENT_CO_STAFF_TEL, T.AGENT_CO_POST_ADDRESS, T.AGENT_CO_MAIL, T.PROF_NO, T.PROF_CO_NAME, T.PROF_CO_MANAGER, T.PROF_CO_MANAGER_TEL, T.PROF_CO_STAFF, T.PROF_CO_STAFF_TEL, T.PROF_CO_POST_ADDRESS, T.PROF_CO_MAIL, T.CONTRACT_CO_NO, T.CONTRACT_CO_NAME, T.CONTRACT_CO_MANAGER, T.CONTRACT_CO_MANAGER_TEL, T.CONTRACT_CO_STAFF, T.CONTRACT_CO_STAFF_TEL, T.CONTRACT_CO_POST_ADDRESS, T.CONTRACT_CO_MAIL, T.DOC_REC_DATE, T.PROGRESS_STATUS, T.PRE_SET, T.PRE_PRICE, T.SUPPORT_DOC_DATE, T.DRAFT_DATE, T.APPROVAL_SND_DATE, T.APPROVAL_RCV_DATE, T.DELI_NO, T.REPORT_RAISE_DATE, T.REPORT_SEAL_DATE, T.REPORT_ARR_TYPE, T.REPORT_ARR_DATE, T.REG_DATE, T.AGENT_INFO, T.CONTRACT_CO_ID, T.CONTRACT_CO_INFO, T.VERIFY_PER_AMOUNT, T.VERIFY_AMOUNT, T.VERIFY_INCREASE, T.VERIFY_DECREASE, T.VERIFY_DIFF, T.VERIFY_DIFF_RATE, T.CNT_PRICE, T.PROJ_PRICE, T.LIMIT_PRICE, T.CNTRCT_PRICE, T.PLAN_DOC_RCV_DATE, T.PLAN_DOC_RPT_DATE, T.PLAN_DOC_SND_DATE, T.PLAN_DOC_ARR_DATE, T.BID_DOC_RCV_DATE, T.BID_DOC_RPT_DATE, T.BID_DOC_SND_DATE, T.BID_DOC_ARR_DATE, T.SIGN_DOC_RCV_DATE, T.SIGN_DOC_RPT_DATE, T.SIGN_DOC_SND_DATE, T.SIGN_DOC_ARR_DATE, T.SET_DOC_RCV_DATE, T.SET_DOC_RPT_DATE, T.SET_DOC_SND_DATE, T.SET_DOC_ARR_DATE, T.PROGRESS_STATUS_MEMO, T.A_AMOUNT, T.A_STATUS, T.B_TYPE, T.B_AMOUNT, T.A_INVOICE_DELI_DATE, T.A_INVOICE_DATE, T.A_INVOICE_NO, T.A_SET_DATE, T.B_INVOICE_DELI_DATE, T.B_INVOICE_DATE, T.B_INVOICE_NO, T.B_SET_DATE, T.RESERVE1, T.RESERVE2, T.RESERVE3, T.RESERVE4, T.RESERVE5, T.RESERVE6, T.RESERVE7, T.RESERVE8, T.RESERVE9, T.RESERVE10, T.LATEST_FLG, T.DELETE_FLG, T.UPDATE_USER, T.INSERT_DATE, T.UPDATE_DATE from audit T where 1 = 1 and T.DELETE_FLG = '1'
T.AUDIT_NO >= #AUDIT_NO_LOW#
T.AUDIT_NO <= #AUDIT_NO_HIGH#
T.PROJECT_STATUS = #PROJECT_STATUS#
SUBSTRING_INDEX(T.REPORT_NO,'-',1) like '%$REPORT_NO_COMP$%' ESCAPE '/'
SUBSTRING_INDEX(T.REPORT_NO,'-',-1) >= #REPORT_NO_LOW#
SUBSTRING_INDEX(T.REPORT_NO,'-',-1) <= #REPORT_NO_HIGH#
T.PROJECT_MANAGER like '%$PROJECT_MANAGER$%' ESCAPE '/'
T.AGENT_NO = #AGENT_NO#
T.AGENT_CO_NAME like '%$AGENT_CO_NAME$%' ESCAPE '/'
T.CONTRACT_CO_NAME like '%$CONTRACT_CO_NAME$%' ESCAPE '/'
T.PROJECT_NAME like '%$PROJECT_NAME$%' ESCAPE '/'
T.RESERVE1 = #RESERVE1#
) TT where 1 = 1 AND (TT.B_SET_DATE IS NULL OR TT.B_SET_DATE > NOW()) UNION select TT.* from (select T.AUDIT_NO, '3' AS AUDIT_STATUS, T.CONTRACT_NO, T.CONTRACTSNM, T.REPORT_NO, T.PROJECT_MANAGER, T.PROJECT_NAME, T.PROJECT_TYPE, T.PROJECT_STATUS, T.AGENT_NO, T.AGENT_CO_NAME, T.AGENT_CO_MANAGER, T.AGENT_CO_MANAGER_TEL, T.AGENT_CO_STAFF, T.AGENT_CO_STAFF_TEL, T.AGENT_CO_POST_ADDRESS, T.AGENT_CO_MAIL, T.PROF_NO, T.PROF_CO_NAME, T.PROF_CO_MANAGER, T.PROF_CO_MANAGER_TEL, T.PROF_CO_STAFF, T.PROF_CO_STAFF_TEL, T.PROF_CO_POST_ADDRESS, T.PROF_CO_MAIL, T.CONTRACT_CO_NO, T.CONTRACT_CO_NAME, T.CONTRACT_CO_MANAGER, T.CONTRACT_CO_MANAGER_TEL, T.CONTRACT_CO_STAFF, T.CONTRACT_CO_STAFF_TEL, T.CONTRACT_CO_POST_ADDRESS, T.CONTRACT_CO_MAIL, T.DOC_REC_DATE, T.PROGRESS_STATUS, T.PRE_SET, T.PRE_PRICE, T.SUPPORT_DOC_DATE, T.DRAFT_DATE, T.APPROVAL_SND_DATE, T.APPROVAL_RCV_DATE, T.DELI_NO, T.REPORT_RAISE_DATE, T.REPORT_SEAL_DATE, T.REPORT_ARR_TYPE, T.REPORT_ARR_DATE, T.REG_DATE, T.AGENT_INFO, T.CONTRACT_CO_ID, T.CONTRACT_CO_INFO, T.VERIFY_PER_AMOUNT, T.VERIFY_AMOUNT, T.VERIFY_INCREASE, T.VERIFY_DECREASE, T.VERIFY_DIFF, T.VERIFY_DIFF_RATE, T.CNT_PRICE, T.PROJ_PRICE, T.LIMIT_PRICE, T.CNTRCT_PRICE, T.PLAN_DOC_RCV_DATE, T.PLAN_DOC_RPT_DATE, T.PLAN_DOC_SND_DATE, T.PLAN_DOC_ARR_DATE, T.BID_DOC_RCV_DATE, T.BID_DOC_RPT_DATE, T.BID_DOC_SND_DATE, T.BID_DOC_ARR_DATE, T.SIGN_DOC_RCV_DATE, T.SIGN_DOC_RPT_DATE, T.SIGN_DOC_SND_DATE, T.SIGN_DOC_ARR_DATE, T.SET_DOC_RCV_DATE, T.SET_DOC_RPT_DATE, T.SET_DOC_SND_DATE, T.SET_DOC_ARR_DATE, T.PROGRESS_STATUS_MEMO, T.A_AMOUNT, T.A_STATUS, T.B_TYPE, T.B_AMOUNT, T.A_INVOICE_DELI_DATE, T.A_INVOICE_DATE, T.A_INVOICE_NO, T.A_SET_DATE, T.B_INVOICE_DELI_DATE, T.B_INVOICE_DATE, T.B_INVOICE_NO, T.B_SET_DATE, T.RESERVE1, T.RESERVE2, T.RESERVE3, T.RESERVE4, T.RESERVE5, T.RESERVE6, T.RESERVE7, T.RESERVE8, T.RESERVE9, T.RESERVE10, T.LATEST_FLG, T.DELETE_FLG, T.UPDATE_USER, T.INSERT_DATE, T.UPDATE_DATE from audit T where 1 = 1 and T.DELETE_FLG = '1'
T.AUDIT_NO >= #AUDIT_NO_LOW#
T.AUDIT_NO <= #AUDIT_NO_HIGH#
T.PROJECT_STATUS = #PROJECT_STATUS#
SUBSTRING_INDEX(T.REPORT_NO,'-',1) like '%$REPORT_NO_COMP$%' ESCAPE '/'
SUBSTRING_INDEX(T.REPORT_NO,'-',-1) >= #REPORT_NO_LOW#
SUBSTRING_INDEX(T.REPORT_NO,'-',-1) <= #REPORT_NO_HIGH#
T.PROJECT_MANAGER like '%$PROJECT_MANAGER$%' ESCAPE '/'
T.AGENT_NO = #AGENT_NO#
T.AGENT_CO_NAME like '%$AGENT_CO_NAME$%' ESCAPE '/'
T.CONTRACT_CO_NAME like '%$CONTRACT_CO_NAME$%' ESCAPE '/'
T.PROJECT_NAME like '%$PROJECT_NAME$%' ESCAPE '/'
T.RESERVE1 = #RESERVE1#
) TT where 1 = 1 AND TT.B_SET_DATE IS NOT NULL AND TT.B_SET_DATE <= NOW() ) B where 1 = 1
B.AUDIT_STATUS in ($AUDIT_STATUS$)
order by B.REPORT_NO desc LIMIT #start#, #end#

select B.* from ( select TT.* from (select T.AUDIT_NO, '2' AS AUDIT_STATUS, T.CONTRACT_NO, T.CONTRACTSNM, T.REPORT_NO, T.PROJECT_MANAGER, T.PROJECT_NAME, T.PROJECT_TYPE, T.PROJECT_STATUS, T.AGENT_NO, T.AGENT_CO_NAME, T.AGENT_CO_MANAGER, T.AGENT_CO_MANAGER_TEL, T.AGENT_CO_STAFF, T.AGENT_CO_STAFF_TEL, T.AGENT_CO_POST_ADDRESS, T.AGENT_CO_MAIL, T.PROF_NO, T.PROF_CO_NAME, T.PROF_CO_MANAGER, T.PROF_CO_MANAGER_TEL, T.PROF_CO_STAFF, T.PROF_CO_STAFF_TEL, T.PROF_CO_POST_ADDRESS, T.PROF_CO_MAIL, T.CONTRACT_CO_NO, T.CONTRACT_CO_NAME, T.CONTRACT_CO_MANAGER, T.CONTRACT_CO_MANAGER_TEL, T.CONTRACT_CO_STAFF, T.CONTRACT_CO_STAFF_TEL, T.CONTRACT_CO_POST_ADDRESS, T.CONTRACT_CO_MAIL, T.DOC_REC_DATE, T.PROGRESS_STATUS, T.PRE_SET, T.PRE_PRICE, T.SUPPORT_DOC_DATE, T.DRAFT_DATE, T.APPROVAL_SND_DATE, T.APPROVAL_RCV_DATE, T.DELI_NO, T.REPORT_RAISE_DATE, T.REPORT_SEAL_DATE, T.REPORT_ARR_TYPE, T.REPORT_ARR_DATE, T.REG_DATE, T.AGENT_INFO, T.CONTRACT_CO_ID, T.CONTRACT_CO_INFO, T.VERIFY_PER_AMOUNT, T.VERIFY_AMOUNT, T.VERIFY_INCREASE, T.VERIFY_DECREASE, T.VERIFY_DIFF, T.VERIFY_DIFF_RATE, T.CNT_PRICE, T.PROJ_PRICE, T.LIMIT_PRICE, T.CNTRCT_PRICE, T.PLAN_DOC_RCV_DATE, T.PLAN_DOC_RPT_DATE, T.PLAN_DOC_SND_DATE, T.PLAN_DOC_ARR_DATE, T.BID_DOC_RCV_DATE, T.BID_DOC_RPT_DATE, T.BID_DOC_SND_DATE, T.BID_DOC_ARR_DATE, T.SIGN_DOC_RCV_DATE, T.SIGN_DOC_RPT_DATE, T.SIGN_DOC_SND_DATE, T.SIGN_DOC_ARR_DATE, T.SET_DOC_RCV_DATE, T.SET_DOC_RPT_DATE, T.SET_DOC_SND_DATE, T.SET_DOC_ARR_DATE, T.PROGRESS_STATUS_MEMO, T.A_AMOUNT, T.A_STATUS, T.B_TYPE, T.B_AMOUNT, T.A_INVOICE_DELI_DATE, T.A_INVOICE_DATE, T.A_INVOICE_NO, T.A_SET_DATE, T.B_INVOICE_DELI_DATE, T.B_INVOICE_DATE, T.B_INVOICE_NO, T.B_SET_DATE, T.RESERVE1, T.RESERVE2, T.RESERVE3, T.RESERVE4, T.RESERVE5, T.RESERVE6, T.RESERVE7, T.RESERVE8, T.RESERVE9, T.RESERVE10, T.LATEST_FLG, T.DELETE_FLG, T.UPDATE_USER, T.INSERT_DATE, T.UPDATE_DATE from audit T where 1 = 1 and T.DELETE_FLG = '1'
T.AUDIT_NO >= #AUDIT_NO_LOW#
T.AUDIT_NO <= #AUDIT_NO_HIGH#
T.PROJECT_STATUS = #PROJECT_STATUS#
SUBSTRING_INDEX(T.REPORT_NO,'-',1) like '%$REPORT_NO_COMP$%' ESCAPE '/'
SUBSTRING_INDEX(T.REPORT_NO,'-',-1) >= #REPORT_NO_LOW#
SUBSTRING_INDEX(T.REPORT_NO,'-',-1) <= #REPORT_NO_HIGH#
T.PROJECT_MANAGER like '%$PROJECT_MANAGER$%' ESCAPE '/'
T.AGENT_NO = #AGENT_NO#

T.CONTRACT_CO_NAME like '%$CONTRACT_CO_NAME$%' ESCAPE '/'
T.PROJECT_NAME like '%$PROJECT_NAME$%' ESCAPE '/'
T.RESERVE1 = #RESERVE1#
) TT where 1 = 1 AND (TT.B_SET_DATE IS NULL OR TT.B_SET_DATE > NOW()) UNION select TT.* from (select T.AUDIT_NO, '3' AS AUDIT_STATUS, T.CONTRACT_NO, T.CONTRACTSNM, T.REPORT_NO, T.PROJECT_MANAGER, T.PROJECT_NAME, T.PROJECT_TYPE, T.PROJECT_STATUS, T.AGENT_NO, T.AGENT_CO_NAME, T.AGENT_CO_MANAGER, T.AGENT_CO_MANAGER_TEL, T.AGENT_CO_STAFF, T.AGENT_CO_STAFF_TEL, T.AGENT_CO_POST_ADDRESS, T.AGENT_CO_MAIL, T.PROF_NO, T.PROF_CO_NAME, T.PROF_CO_MANAGER, T.PROF_CO_MANAGER_TEL, T.PROF_CO_STAFF, T.PROF_CO_STAFF_TEL, T.PROF_CO_POST_ADDRESS, T.PROF_CO_MAIL, T.CONTRACT_CO_NO, T.CONTRACT_CO_NAME, T.CONTRACT_CO_MANAGER, T.CONTRACT_CO_MANAGER_TEL, T.CONTRACT_CO_STAFF, T.CONTRACT_CO_STAFF_TEL, T.CONTRACT_CO_POST_ADDRESS, T.CONTRACT_CO_MAIL, T.DOC_REC_DATE, T.PROGRESS_STATUS, T.PRE_SET, T.PRE_PRICE, T.SUPPORT_DOC_DATE, T.DRAFT_DATE, T.APPROVAL_SND_DATE, T.APPROVAL_RCV_DATE, T.DELI_NO, T.REPORT_RAISE_DATE, T.REPORT_SEAL_DATE, T.REPORT_ARR_TYPE, T.REPORT_ARR_DATE, T.REG_DATE, T.AGENT_INFO, T.CONTRACT_CO_ID, T.CONTRACT_CO_INFO, T.VERIFY_PER_AMOUNT, T.VERIFY_AMOUNT, T.VERIFY_INCREASE, T.VERIFY_DECREASE, T.VERIFY_DIFF, T.VERIFY_DIFF_RATE, T.CNT_PRICE, T.PROJ_PRICE, T.LIMIT_PRICE, T.CNTRCT_PRICE, T.PLAN_DOC_RCV_DATE, T.PLAN_DOC_RPT_DATE, T.PLAN_DOC_SND_DATE, T.PLAN_DOC_ARR_DATE, T.BID_DOC_RCV_DATE, T.BID_DOC_RPT_DATE, T.BID_DOC_SND_DATE, T.BID_DOC_ARR_DATE, T.SIGN_DOC_RCV_DATE, T.SIGN_DOC_RPT_DATE, T.SIGN_DOC_SND_DATE, T.SIGN_DOC_ARR_DATE, T.SET_DOC_RCV_DATE, T.SET_DOC_RPT_DATE, T.SET_DOC_SND_DATE, T.SET_DOC_ARR_DATE, T.PROGRESS_STATUS_MEMO, T.A_AMOUNT, T.A_STATUS, T.B_TYPE, T.B_AMOUNT, T.A_INVOICE_DELI_DATE, T.A_INVOICE_DATE, T.A_INVOICE_NO, T.A_SET_DATE, T.B_INVOICE_DELI_DATE, T.B_INVOICE_DATE, T.B_INVOICE_NO, T.B_SET_DATE, T.RESERVE1, T.RESERVE2, T.RESERVE3, T.RESERVE4, T.RESERVE5, T.RESERVE6, T.RESERVE7, T.RESERVE8, T.RESERVE9, T.RESERVE10, T.LATEST_FLG, T.DELETE_FLG, T.UPDATE_USER, T.INSERT_DATE, T.UPDATE_DATE from audit T where 1 = 1 and T.DELETE_FLG = '1'

T.AUDIT_NO <= #AUDIT_NO_HIGH#
T.PROJECT_STATUS = #PROJECT_STATUS#
SUBSTRING_INDEX(T.REPORT_NO,'-',1) like '%$REPORT_NO_COMP$%' ESCAPE '/'
SUBSTRING_INDEX(T.REPORT_NO,'-',-1) >= #REPORT_NO_LOW#
SUBSTRING_INDEX(T.REPORT_NO,'-',-1) <= #REPORT_NO_HIGH#
T.PROJECT_MANAGER like '%$PROJECT_MANAGER$%' ESCAPE '/'
T.AGENT_NO = #AGENT_NO#
T.AGENT_CO_NAME like '%$AGENT_CO_NAME$%' ESCAPE '/'
T.CONTRACT_CO_NAME like '%$CONTRACT_CO_NAME$%' ESCAPE '/'
T.PROJECT_NAME like '%$PROJECT_NAME$%' ESCAPE '/'
T.RESERVE1 = #RESERVE1#
) TT where 1 = 1 AND TT.B_SET_DATE IS NOT NULL AND TT.B_SET_DATE <= NOW() ) B where 1 = 1
B.AUDIT_STATUS in ($AUDIT_STATUS$)
order by B.AUDIT_NO desc

select T.AUDIT_NO, NULL AS AUDIT_STATUS, T.CONTRACT_NO, T.CONTRACTSNM, T.REPORT_NO, T.PROJECT_MANAGER, T.PROJECT_NAME, T.PROJECT_TYPE, T.PROJECT_STATUS, T.AGENT_NO, T.AGENT_CO_NAME, T.AGENT_CO_MANAGER, T.AGENT_CO_MANAGER_TEL, T.AGENT_CO_STAFF, T.AGENT_CO_STAFF_TEL, T.AGENT_CO_POST_ADDRESS, T.AGENT_CO_MAIL, T.PROF_NO, T.PROF_CO_NAME, T.PROF_CO_MANAGER, T.PROF_CO_MANAGER_TEL, T.PROF_CO_STAFF, T.PROF_CO_STAFF_TEL, T.PROF_CO_POST_ADDRESS, T.PROF_CO_MAIL, T.CONTRACT_CO_NO, T.CONTRACT_CO_NAME, T.CONTRACT_CO_MANAGER, T.CONTRACT_CO_MANAGER_TEL, T.CONTRACT_CO_STAFF, T.CONTRACT_CO_STAFF_TEL, T.CONTRACT_CO_POST_ADDRESS, T.CONTRACT_CO_MAIL, T.DOC_REC_DATE, T.PROGRESS_STATUS, T.PRE_SET, T.PRE_PRICE, T.SUPPORT_DOC_DATE, T.DRAFT_DATE, T.APPROVAL_SND_DATE, T.APPROVAL_RCV_DATE, T.DELI_NO, T.REPORT_RAISE_DATE, T.REPORT_SEAL_DATE, T.REPORT_ARR_TYPE, T.REPORT_ARR_DATE, T.REG_DATE, T.AGENT_INFO, T.CONTRACT_CO_ID, T.CONTRACT_CO_INFO, T.VERIFY_PER_AMOUNT, T.VERIFY_AMOUNT, T.VERIFY_INCREASE, T.VERIFY_DECREASE, T.VERIFY_DIFF, T.VERIFY_DIFF_RATE, T.CNT_PRICE, T.PROJ_PRICE, T.LIMIT_PRICE, T.CNTRCT_PRICE, T.PLAN_DOC_RCV_DATE, T.PLAN_DOC_RPT_DATE, T.PLAN_DOC_SND_DATE, T.PLAN_DOC_ARR_DATE, T.BID_DOC_RCV_DATE, T.BID_DOC_RPT_DATE, T.BID_DOC_SND_DATE, T.BID_DOC_ARR_DATE, T.SIGN_DOC_RCV_DATE, T.SIGN_DOC_RPT_DATE, T.SIGN_DOC_SND_DATE, T.SIGN_DOC_ARR_DATE, T.SET_DOC_RCV_DATE, T.SET_DOC_RPT_DATE, T.SET_DOC_SND_DATE, T.SET_DOC_ARR_DATE, T.PROGRESS_STATUS_MEMO, T.A_AMOUNT, T.A_STATUS, T.B_TYPE, T.B_AMOUNT, T.A_INVOICE_DELI_DATE, T.A_INVOICE_DATE, T.A_INVOICE_NO, T.A_SET_DATE, T.B_INVOICE_DELI_DATE, T.B_INVOICE_DATE, T.B_INVOICE_NO, T.B_SET_DATE, T.RESERVE1, T.RESERVE2, T.RESERVE3, T.RESERVE4, T.RESERVE5, T.RESERVE6, T.RESERVE7, T.RESERVE8, T.RESERVE9, T.RESERVE10, T.LATEST_FLG, T.DELETE_FLG, T.UPDATE_USER, T.INSERT_DATE, T.UPDATE_DATE from audit T where AUDIT_NO = #AUDIT_NO# and DELETE_FLG = '1'

select T.AUDIT_NO, NULL AS AUDIT_STATUS, T.CONTRACT_NO, T.CONTRACTSNM, T.REPORT_NO, T.PROJECT_MANAGER, T.PROJECT_NAME, T.PROJECT_TYPE, T.PROJECT_STATUS, T.AGENT_NO, T.AGENT_CO_NAME, T.AGENT_CO_MANAGER, T.AGENT_CO_MANAGER_TEL, T.AGENT_CO_STAFF, T.AGENT_CO_STAFF_TEL, T.AGENT_CO_POST_ADDRESS, T.AGENT_CO_MAIL, T.PROF_NO, T.PROF_CO_NAME, T.PROF_CO_MANAGER, T.PROF_CO_MANAGER_TEL, T.PROF_CO_STAFF, T.PROF_CO_STAFF_TEL, T.PROF_CO_POST_ADDRESS, T.PROF_CO_MAIL, T.CONTRACT_CO_NO, T.CONTRACT_CO_NAME, T.CONTRACT_CO_MANAGER, T.CONTRACT_CO_MANAGER_TEL, T.CONTRACT_CO_STAFF, T.CONTRACT_CO_STAFF_TEL, T.CONTRACT_CO_POST_ADDRESS, T.CONTRACT_CO_MAIL, T.DOC_REC_DATE, T.PROGRESS_STATUS, T.PRE_SET, T.PRE_PRICE, T.SUPPORT_DOC_DATE, T.DRAFT_DATE, T.APPROVAL_SND_DATE, T.APPROVAL_RCV_DATE, T.DELI_NO, T.REPORT_RAISE_DATE, T.REPORT_SEAL_DATE, T.REPORT_ARR_TYPE, T.REPORT_ARR_DATE, T.REG_DATE, T.AGENT_INFO, T.CONTRACT_CO_ID, T.CONTRACT_CO_INFO, T.VERIFY_PER_AMOUNT, T.VERIFY_AMOUNT, T.VERIFY_INCREASE, T.VERIFY_DECREASE, T.VERIFY_DIFF, T.VERIFY_DIFF_RATE, T.CNT_PRICE, T.PROJ_PRICE, T.LIMIT_PRICE, T.CNTRCT_PRICE, T.PLAN_DOC_RCV_DATE, T.PLAN_DOC_RPT_DATE, T.PLAN_DOC_SND_DATE, T.PLAN_DOC_ARR_DATE, T.BID_DOC_RCV_DATE, T.BID_DOC_RPT_DATE, T.BID_DOC_SND_DATE, T.BID_DOC_ARR_DATE, T.SIGN_DOC_RCV_DATE, T.SIGN_DOC_RPT_DATE, T.SIGN_DOC_SND_DATE, T.SIGN_DOC_ARR_DATE, T.SET_DOC_RCV_DATE, T.SET_DOC_RPT_DATE, T.SET_DOC_SND_DATE, T.SET_DOC_ARR_DATE, T.PROGRESS_STATUS_MEMO, T.A_AMOUNT, T.A_STATUS, T.B_TYPE, T.B_AMOUNT, T.A_INVOICE_DELI_DATE, T.A_INVOICE_DATE, T.A_INVOICE_NO, T.A_SET_DATE, T.B_INVOICE_DELI_DATE, T.B_INVOICE_DATE, T.B_INVOICE_NO, T.B_SET_DATE, T.RESERVE1, T.RESERVE2, T.RESERVE3, T.RESERVE4, T.RESERVE5, T.RESERVE6, T.RESERVE7, T.RESERVE8, T.RESERVE9, T.RESERVE10, T.LATEST_FLG, T.DELETE_FLG, T.UPDATE_USER, T.INSERT_DATE, T.UPDATE_DATE from audit T where AUDIT_NO = #AUDIT_NO#
